body: were the infractions reseted? bcuz I looked at my account and I have no infractions at all

title: question

replies.body: A few players were rolled back including me, not sure why though.
replies.body_tagged: A few players were rolled back including me, not sure why though.

replies.body: Mine were not but I was going to ask the same thing. My cousin that was banned 4 months ago his profile shows no infractions.

replies.body: well that's good. I no longer have a long infraction list
